channel.title: Draynor - Experience Perfection
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://Draynor.org/home/imgs/logo.png[/img]
Server Name: Draynor
Revision: 317
Type: Economy
[CODE]Draynor will be an Economy Server, that is loading 317/667 Data. We strive for perfection, and do not accept anything but excellence on our part. The developers will be going in overtime to make this the best Economy it can possibly be. This is Draynor, Experience Perfection.[/CODE]
[SPOILER=Skills & Details] Crafting[IMG]http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122231154/runescape/images/thumb/4/48/Crafting-icon.png/21px-Crafting-icon.png[/img] -Pottery spinning and firing. -Leather crafting of all sorts, includes tanning, all parts, etc. -Gem cutting and crafting, ability to create every type of jewlery. -Spinning and weaving using the spinning wheel and loom. -Sheep sheering, flax picking, etc. -Glassblowing with every possibility. -Battlestaff creation, crafting and combining orbs. Includes special stalves. -Ganodermic and other special armor crafting.
Fletching[IMG]http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122200317/runescape/images/thumb/7/77/Fletching-icon.png/21px-Fletching-icon.png[/img] -Bolt and arrow fetching of all sorts. -Every log is function able, along with the 1 click options. -Bows (both short and long) and crossbows can be fletched. -Dart creation of all sorts.
Slayer[IMG]http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121214705/runescape/images/thumb/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png/19px-Slayer-icon.png[/img] -Every slayer master (total of 10) with different requirements. -Every current RuneScape task of the time (over 200+). -Enchanted gem, ring of slaying, etc. are all working. -Unlocked abilities via the rewards shop (eg. slayer helm crafting, broad tipped bolt fletching, final blows, etc) -Realistic task requirements (both items and level requirements including final blows). -Correct slayer shops to buy all the equipment needed for your slayer tasks. -Ability to cancel, permanently block, re assign, etc tasks and keep track of them. -Co op slayer, mostly functioning including interfaces and partnerships. -Complete slayer points system with the full rewards system.
Hunter[IMG]http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122231405/runescape/images/8/83/Hunter-icon.png[/img] -Pitfall traps, currently only for Larupa. -Hunter gear with their proper effects. -Box traps for: Geckos, Salamanders, Grenwalls, Chinchompas (both), Ferrets, Platypus, Racoons, and Monkeys (nearly all). -Butterfly net and hand catching for: Butterflies and Implings. -Bird snares for: Crimson Swifts, Golden Warbler, Copper Long tail, Cerulean Twitch, Tropical Wagtail, and Wimpy Bird.
Mining[IMG]http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122191026/runescape/images/thumb/2/28/Mining-icon.png/21px-Mining-icon.png[/img] -Every sort of ore is mine-able. -Correct prospecting, regenerating rocks, etc. -All pickaxes working which effect your mining along with your level. -Every mining location functioning. -Living rock cavern ore veins working. -Special kinds of rocks such as limestone, granite, sandstone, etc. -Full and complete gem mining. -Ability to recieve random gems while mining. -Pure and rune essence mining.
Smithing[IMG]http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122232120/runescape/images/thumb/d/df/Smithing-icon.png/21px-Smithing-icon.png[/img] -All bars have the ability to be smelt. -Ability to smith any item out of any bar. -Cannonball smithing with the mold. -Moulds for every form of jewlery can be properly used. -Creating all kinds of items such as dragon platebodys, dragonfire shields, etc.
Fishing[IMG]http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120123002210/runescape/images/thumb/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png/21px-Fishing-icon.png[/img] -Every kind of fishing possible. -Fishing spots spawned all over the world. -Bare-hand and barb tailed harpoon fishing. -Barbarian techniques learned from Otto. -Barbarian heavy rod fishing. -Proper rod fishing for bait and feathers. -Chances of catching giant fish for construction.
Cooking[IMG]http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122233047/runescape/images/thumb/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png/17px-Cooking-icon.png[/img] -Cooking and burning of every possible food. -Ability to cook special foods such as meats, bread, pies, pizza, etc. -Cooking on all sorts of things such as fires, stoves, furnaces, etc.
Firemaking[IMG]http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121214502/runescape/images/thumb/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png/18px-Firemaking-icon.png[/img] -Barbarian firemaking techniques. -Pyre ship lighting learned from Otto. -Inferno adze implementation. -Lighting of sources of light such as torches, candles, and lanterns. -Light source handling in dark areas and caves. -Bonfires working completely with the spirits. -Proper firemaking with clipping.
Woodcutting[IMG]http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122222709/runescape/images/thumb/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png/18px-Woodcutting-icon.png[/img] -Bird nests when chopping trees. -Proper ivy with chopping down and such. -Creation of canoes for transportations. -Jungle woodcutting with machetes. -Every type of woodcutting from dead to magics. -Saw mill operating to turn logs into planks.
Farming[IMG]http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122213349/runescape/images/thumb/f/f0/Farming-icon.png/21px-Farming-icon.png[/img] -Farming with all kinds of patches (alloments, herbs, bushes, hops, flower, tree, special, etc.) -Proper timing and growth of all plants. -Watering patches with drying out and dieing. -Use of compost, creating compost, super compost, etc. -Plant disease, curing, and dieing. -Tool leapracaun noting items. -Sapling growing and handling. -Proper harvesting for all of the plants. -Weed raking and proper use of all the tools.
Construction[IMG]http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122233804/runescape/images/thumb/e/e5/Construction-icon.png/21px-Construction-icon.png[/img] -House purchasing from the estate agent. -Ability to chose the location of your house. -Furniture and room creation and saving. -Every type of furniture is interactable (yes all 100+, lecturns, altars, boxing rings, portals, etc). -Previeing rooms, building mode, etc. -House interface to toggle different settings. -Multi floor support including upper and dungeon levels. -Handling of guests, kicking them, serving them, etc.
Runecrafting[IMG]http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122223427/runescape/images/thumb/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png/20px-Runecrafting-icon.png[/img] -Crafting and entering of any type of rune altars. -Multi elemental rune crafting (such as steam, lava, etc). -Chances of crafting multiple runes in one go. -Working pouches with degrading. -Abyssal runecrafting working. -Talisman and tiara entering of altars. -Pure and rune crafting.
Thieving[IMG]http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122201600/runescape/images/thumb/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png/21px-Thieving-icon.png[/img] -Pickpocketing of every type of npc. -All stalls are thievable, including the proper loots. -Guards will attack you if caught stealing. -H.A.M. members will knock you out if caught. -Door and trap door picklocking all over the world.
Herblore[IMG]http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122235046/runescape/images/thumb/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png/21px-Herblore-icon.png[/img] -Cleaning of all herbs, including herbicide bonuses. -Potion creating of all kinds. -Special potions, such as overloads, creations. -Working flasks of all kinds. -Proper decanting for every filling of potions. -Unfinished potion handling.
Agility[IMG]http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122221423/runescape/images/8/84/Agility-icon.png[/img] -Weight processing in your running. -Agility level properly effects your running aswell. -Gnome Regular and Advanced courses. -Barbarian Regular and Advanced courses. -Wilderness Agility course. -Agility Pyramid. -Worldwide agility shortcuts and areas that can be used. -Proper grappling useage in the appropriate spots.
Summoning[IMG]http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121220226/runescape/images/thumb/e/e3/Summoning-icon.png/19px-Summoning-icon.png[/img] -Charm drops from all the proper monsters. -Pouch and scroll creation interface. -Left click options, familiar information, attacking, etc. -Every single familiar ability and special has been added. -All pets have been added. -Summoning armor is properly working. -Recharging of summoning points.
Prayer[IMG]http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121220329/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img] -Every prayer working including ancient curses. -Proper prayer recharging and switching at altars. -Bonuses from gilded altars, all bone burying. -Scattering ashes.
Magic[IMG]http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122182526/runescape/images/thumb/7/77/Magic-icon.png/21px-Magic-icon.png[/img] -All spells working from the spell books: regular, lunar, and ancient. -Magical staffs working properly with rune consumption. -Alchemy, enchanting, etc spells working properly. -All forms of teleportation, blocks, etc. -Special item requiring spells working. [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Minigames] -Pest Control -Puro Puro -Soulwars -Duel Arena -Castle Wars -Clan Wars -Barrows -Fight Caves -Fight Pits -Fist of Guthix [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Distractions and Diversions] -Evil Trees [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Other] -Player Shadows -ItemDefinitions has been added -Gameframe completed -New equipment interface -Refactored some client classes -Cleaned up eclipse warnings -GUI launcher is completed -Global npc and item spawns, nearly all of them. -Lot's more, just look at the update posts! [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Images]
[B][CENTER]Character Customization: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UKsihKs.png[/img] [/CENTER][/B]
[B][CENTER]Character Customization(Continued): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ploQTCO.png[/img] [/CENTER][/B]
[B][CENTER]Member Ranks: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/whL0SiU.png[/img] [/CENTER][/B]
[B][CENTER]Dialogues: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0TFOFJb.png[/img] [/CENTER][/B]
[B][CENTER]Dialogues(Continued): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/725CVfe.png[/img] [/CENTER][/B]
[B][CENTER]Farming: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zQnoN7C.png[/img] [/CENTER][/B]
[B][CENTER]Farming(Continued): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CfXv4p4.png[/img] [/CENTER][/B]
[B]Construction: [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4058500/simple_house_pic.png[/img] [/B]
[B]Construction(Continued): [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4058502/throne_room.png[/img] [/B][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Links] [URL=http://"http://Draynor.org/"]Home[/URL] [URL=http://"http://Draynor.org/community/"]Community[/URL] [URL=http://"http://Draynor.org/Draynor.jar"]BETA Client[/URL] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Support Us] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7FLfcpY.gif[/img] [/SPOILER]

item.title: Draynor - Experience Perfection
item.dc:creator: @pumpklins pumpklins
item.description:
@pumpklins wrote:

[center]

Server Name: Draynor

Revision: 317

Type: Economy

Draynor will be an Economy Server, that is loading 317/667 Data. We strive for perfection, and do not accept anything but excellence on our part. The developers will be going in overtime to make this the best Economy it can possibly be. This is Draynor, Experience Perfection.

[SPOILER=Skills & Details]
Crafting
-Pottery spinning and firing.
-Leather crafting of all sorts, includes tanning, all parts, etc.
-Gem cutting and crafting, ability to create every type of jewlery.
-Spinning and weaving using the spinning wheel and loom.
-Sheep sheering, flax picking, etc.
-Glassblowing with every possibility.
-Battlestaff creation, crafting and combining orbs. Includes special stalves.
-Ganodermic and other special armor crafting.

Fletching
-Bolt and arrow fetching of all sorts.
-Every log is function able, along with the 1 click options.
-Bows (both short and long) and crossbows can be fletched.
-Dart creation of all sorts.

Slayer
-Every slayer master (total of 10) with different requirements.
-Every current RuneScape task of the time (over 200+).
-Enchanted gem, ring of slaying, etc. are all working.
-Unlocked abilities via the rewards shop (eg. slayer helm crafting, broad tipped bolt fletching, final blows, etc)
-Realistic task requirements (both items and level requirements including final blows).
-Correct slayer shops to buy all the equipment needed for your slayer tasks.
-Ability to cancel, permanently block, re assign, etc tasks and keep track of them.
-Co op slayer, mostly functioning including interfaces and partnerships.
-Complete slayer points system with the full rewards system.

Hunter
-Pitfall traps, currently only for Larupa.
-Hunter gear with their proper effects.
-Box traps for: Geckos, Salamanders, Grenwalls, Chinchompas (both), Ferrets, Platypus, Racoons, and Monkeys (nearly all).
-Butterfly net and hand catching for: Butterflies and Implings.
-Bird snares for: Crimson Swifts, Golden Warbler, Copper Long tail, Cerulean Twitch, Tropical Wagtail, and Wimpy Bird.

Mining
-Every sort of ore is mine-able.
-Correct prospecting, regenerating rocks, etc.
-All pickaxes working which effect your mining along with your level.
-Every mining location functioning.
-Living rock cavern ore veins working.
-Special kinds of rocks such as limestone, granite, sandstone, etc.
-Full and complete gem mining.
-Ability to recieve random gems while mining.
-Pure and rune essence mining.

Smithing
-All bars have the ability to be smelt.
-Ability to smith any item out of any bar.
-Cannonball smithing with the mold.
-Moulds for every form of jewlery can be properly used.
-Creating all kinds of items such as dragon platebodys, dragonfire shields, etc.

Fishing
-Every kind of fishing possible.
-Fishing spots spawned all over the world.
-Bare-hand and barb tailed harpoon fishing.
-Barbarian techniques learned from Otto.
-Barbarian heavy rod fishing.
-Proper rod fishing for bait and feathers.
-Chances of catching giant fish for construction.

Cooking
-Cooking and burning of every possible food.
-Ability to cook special foods such as meats, bread, pies, pizza, etc.
-Cooking on all sorts of things such as fires, stoves, furnaces, etc.

Firemaking
-Barbarian firemaking techniques.
-Pyre ship lighting learned from Otto.
-Inferno adze implementation.
-Lighting of sources of light such as torches, candles, and lanterns.
-Light source handling in dark areas and caves.
-Bonfires working completely with the spirits.
-Proper firemaking with clipping.

Woodcutting
-Bird nests when chopping trees.
-Proper ivy with chopping down and such.
-Creation of canoes for transportations.
-Jungle woodcutting with machetes.
-Every type of woodcutting from dead to magics.
-Saw mill operating to turn logs into planks.

Farming
-Farming with all kinds of patches (alloments, herbs, bushes, hops, flower, tree, special, etc.)
-Proper timing and growth of all plants.
-Watering patches with drying out and dieing.
-Use of compost, creating compost, super compost, etc.
-Plant disease, curing, and dieing.
-Tool leapracaun noting items.
-Sapling growing and handling.
-Proper harvesting for all of the plants.
-Weed raking and proper use of all the tools.

Construction
-House purchasing from the estate agent.
-Ability to chose the location of your house.
-Furniture and room creation and saving.
-Every type of furniture is interactable (yes all 100+, lecturns, altars, boxing rings, portals, etc).
-Previeing rooms, building mode, etc.
-House interface to toggle different settings.
-Multi floor support including upper and dungeon levels.
-Handling of guests, kicking them, serving them, etc.

Runecrafting
-Crafting and entering of any type of rune altars.
-Multi elemental rune crafting (such as steam, lava, etc).
-Chances of crafting multiple runes in one go.
-Working pouches with degrading.
-Abyssal runecrafting working.
-Talisman and tiara entering of altars.
-Pure and rune crafting.

Thieving
-Pickpocketing of every type of npc.
-All stalls are thievable, including the proper loots.
-Guards will attack you if caught stealing.
-H.A.M. members will knock you out if caught.
-Door and trap door picklocking all over the world.

Herblore
-Cleaning of all herbs, including herbicide bonuses.
-Potion creating of all kinds.
-Special potions, such as overloads, creations.
-Working flasks of all kinds.
-Proper decanting for every filling of potions.
-Unfinished potion handling.

Agility
-Weight processing in your running.
-Agility level properly effects your running aswell.
-Gnome Regular and Advanced courses.
-Barbarian Regular and Advanced courses.
-Wilderness Agility course.
-Agility Pyramid.
-Worldwide agility shortcuts and areas that can be used.
-Proper grappling useage in the appropriate spots.

Summoning
-Charm drops from all the proper monsters.
-Pouch and scroll creation interface.
-Left click options, familiar information, attacking, etc.
-Every single familiar ability and special has been added.
-All pets have been added.
-Summoning armor is properly working.
-Recharging of summoning points.

Prayer
-Every prayer working including ancient curses.
-Proper prayer recharging and switching at altars.
-Bonuses from gilded altars, all bone burying.
-Scattering ashes.

Magic
-All spells working from the spell books: regular, lunar, and ancient.
-Magical staffs working properly with rune consumption.
-Alchemy, enchanting, etc spells working properly.
-All forms of teleportation, blocks, etc.
-Special item requiring spells working.
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Minigames]
-Pest Control
-Puro Puro
-Soulwars
-Duel Arena
-Castle Wars
-Clan Wars
-Barrows
-Fight Caves
-Fight Pits
-Fist of Guthix
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Distractions and Diversions]
-Evil Trees
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Other]
-Player Shadows
-ItemDefinitions has been added
-Gameframe completed
-New equipment interface
-Refactored some client classes
-Cleaned up eclipse warnings
-GUI launcher is completed
-Global npc and item spawns, nearly all of them.
-Lot’s more, just look at the update posts!
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Images]

[/CENTER][/B]

[/CENTER][/B]
